pkgmetadata.longdescription: # poetry-githooks## InstallThis repository is made to work with [poetry](https://python-poetry.org/). Assuming you have a working `poetry` setup, run```poetry add -D poetry-githooks```## InstallCreate a `tool.githooks` section in your `pyproject.toml` file and define your git hooks, for example```[tool.githooks]pre-commit = "black ."```then run```poetry run githooks setup```That's it :tada: your hooks will be ran using `poetry` when expected**IMPORTANT** You need to rerun `poetry run githooks setup` everytime you change `[tool.githooks]`
